entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with snow in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
